title: Videos content in the devonfw Guide
breadcrumbs: Version 2.1 New features, improvements and updates
text:
Videos content in the devonfw Guide

The devonfw Guide is the single, authoritative tutorial and reference ("cookbook") for all things devonfw, targeted at the general developer working with the platform (there is another document for Architects).  It is clear and concise but because of the large scope and wide reach of devonfw, it comes with a hefty 370+ pages. For the impatient - and sometimes images do indeed say more than words - weâ€™ve added videos to the Guide which significantly speed up getting started with the diverse aspects of devonfw.


For more information on videos check out our devonfw Youtube channel
